title: Pset_ProtectiveDeviceTrippingUnitTypeResidualCurrent
description: Information on tripping units that are activated by residual current.

TrippingUnitReleaseCurrent.title: TrippingUnitReleaseCurrent
TrippingUnitReleaseCurrent.description: The value of tripping or residual current for which the device has the possibility to be equipped. The values are given in mA.
